渝.definition: short name for Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2 qing4]; old name of Jialing River 嘉陵江[Jia1 ling2 Jiang1] in Sichuan

渝中.definition: Yuzhong, the central district of Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

渝中區.definition: Yuzhong, the central district of Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

渝北.definition: Yubei, a district of Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

渝北區.definition: Yubei, a district of Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

渝水.definition: old name of the Jialing River 嘉陵江[Jia1ling2 Jiang1] in Sichuan and Chongqing; see 渝水區|渝水区[Yu2shui3 Qu1]

渝水區.definition: Yushui, a district of Xinyu 新余市[Xin1yu2 Shi4], Jiangxi
